NuGet Server for Sitecore 1.1 rev. 150626 ------------------------------------------------------------- Date: 26-Jun-2015 ------------------------------------------------------------- This package installs a NuGet server on your Sitecore server. It allows NuGet packages to be configured using a Sitecore config file.
------------------------------------------------------------- *** PRE-INSTALLATION STEPS *** Installation WILL FAIL if you do not follow these steps!
Make the following changes to web.config:
1. Add the following to configuration > system.serviceModel
<serviceHostingEnvironment aspNetCompatibilityEnabled="true"/>
------------------------------------------------------------- *** POST-INSTALLATION STEPS - AUTOMATIC *** The steps described in the POST-INSTALLATION STEPS - MANUAL will be performed automatically if you allow it. The installation wizard will prompt you to allow changes to web.config. If you click OK you do not need to complete the following steps.
In order for the changes to be made automatically the identity running the ASP.NET application pool for the Sitecore website must have write-access to web.config. If the write-access is not granted the installation WILL FAIL!
------------------------------------------------------------- *** POST-INSTALLATION STEPS - MANUAL *** If you do not allow the changes to be made automatically you must make the following changes to web.config. If you skip these steps the installation WILL FAIL!
1. Add the following to configuration > configSections <sectionGroup name="elmah"> <section name="security" requirePermission="false" type="Elmah.SecuritySectionHandler, Elmah"/> <section name="errorLog" requirePermission="false" type="Elmah.ErrorLogSectionHandler, Elmah"/> <section name="errorMail" requirePermission="false" type="Elmah.ErrorMailSectionHandler, Elmah"/> <section name="errorFilter" requirePermission="false" type="Elmah.ErrorFilterSectionHandler, Elmah"/> </sectionGroup>
2. Add the following to configuration > appSettings <add key="requireApiKey" value="true"/> <add key="apiKey" value=""/> <add key="packagesPath" value=""/> <add key="allowOverrideExistingPackageOnPush" value="true"/> <add key="enableDelisting" value="false"/> <add key="enableFrameworkFiltering" value="false"/>
3. Add the following to configuration > system.webServer > modules <add name="ErrorLog" type="Elmah.ErrorLogModule, Elmah" preCondition="managedHandler"/> <add name="ErrorMail" type="Elmah.ErrorMailModule, Elmah" preCondition="managedHandler"/> <add name="ErrorFilter" type="Elmah.ErrorFilterModule, Elmah" preCondition="managedHandler"/>
4. Add the following to configuration > system.webServer <staticContent> <mimeMap fileExtension=".nupkg" mimeType="application/zip"/> </staticContent>
5. Add the following to configuration > system.web > httpModules <add name="ErrorLog" type="Elmah.ErrorLogModule, Elmah"/> <add name="ErrorMail" type="Elmah.ErrorMailModule, Elmah"/> <add name="ErrorFilter" type="Elmah.ErrorFilterModule, Elmah"/>
6. Add the following to configuration <elmah> <security allowRemoteAccess="false"/> <errorLog type="Elmah.XmlFileErrorLog, Elmah" logPath="~/App_Data"/> </elmah> <location path="elmah.axd" inheritInChildApplications="false"> <system.web> <httpHandlers> <add verb="POST,GET,HEAD" path="elmah.axd" type="Elmah.ErrorLogPageFactory, Elmah"/> </httpHandlers> </system.web> <system.webServer> <handlers> <add name="ELMAH" verb="POST,GET,HEAD" path="elmah.axd" type="Elmah.ErrorLogPageFactory, Elmah" preCondition="integratedMode"/> </handlers> </system.webServer> </location>
------------------------------------------------------------- NuGet Server for Sitecore 1.1 runs on: - Sitecore XP 8.0
*** NOTE *** This module should run on any version of Sitecore that meets the requirements for the NuGet.Server package. For more information see https://www.nuget.org/packages/NuGet.Server
